title: I'm terribly horrible at this game, it's shameful
body:
I just learned about this game on 2 Thursdays ago. I just installed yesterday and started playing for real today. I have seen so many YouTubers play this and they are labeled as champions or are just really really good at it (like LilyPichu, which is my favorite). They do special moves, they get killing sprees, and so many more things, but i always get nothing special. The only thing I'm good at is dying. I do okay on trials, but not with other players. I'm afraid, no matter what, that they'll think of me as a terrible player (and it's true I am). How do I get better and smarter with the game and playing? Where is the best beginner's guide for this game?






I just want to become a legend... :(

The absolute best advice I can give for a new player is practice on maximizing your farm count (cs) and having as few deaths as possible. Kills wont necessarily win you games but staying alive allows you to be in the game and contributing to the match. You can't help your team if you are dead with respawn timer. 

Best of luck to you and welcome to League!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

A good first step would be to start out in some Co-Op vs AI matches as that will let you freely experiment with more of the gameplay mechanics. If you post this over in Gameplay or Player Recruitment you'll get a lot more visibility as well and more people can hop in and give you pointers ^_^!
